Uses of Class
jam.plot.Display.Preferences

Packages that use Display.Preferences
jam.plot Classes for controlling the representation of the plots portion of Jam's display. 
 

Uses of Display.Preferences in jam.plot
 

Fields in jam.plot declared as Display.Preferences
static Display.Preferences Display.Preferences.AUTO_IGNORE_ZERO
          If true, ignore channel 0 when autoscaling the plot.
static Display.Preferences Display.Preferences.AUTO_IGNORE_FULL
          If true, ignore the last channel when autoscaling the plot.
static Display.Preferences Display.Preferences.WHITE_BACKGROUND
          If true, use black-on-white for displaying the plot.
static Display.Preferences Display.Preferences.BLACK_BACKGROUND
          If true, use white-on-black for displaying the plot.
static Display.Preferences Display.Preferences.AUTO_PEAK_FIND
          If true, automatically find peaks and display their centroids.
static Display.Preferences Display.Preferences.CONTINUOUS_2D_LOG
          If true, show a continuous gradient color scale on 2d plots.
 

Methods in jam.plot with parameters of type Display.Preferences
 void Display.setPreference(Display.Preferences preference, boolean state)
          Set a display preference.
